episode39.name: 39   Portis and Qualls Depature, and TJ Hammonds Interview
episode39.description: We discuss the recent announcement of Arkansas' biggest stars declaring for the NBA draft. What the lineup and expectations might be for next season. We also have an interview with Arkansas commit TJ Hammonds.
episode39.keywords: football, basketball, Hammonds, Razorbacks, the hog cast, NBA Draft, Portis, Qualls
